message:
Message-ID: <12345.JavaMail.evans@thyme>
Date: Mon, 1 Jan 2001 08:00:00 -0700 (PDT)
From: john.doe@enron.com
To: jane.smith@enron.com
Subject: Action Required: Review Q1 Budget Proposal

Hi Jane,

Please review the attached Q1 budget proposal (Q1_Budget_V2.pdf) by EOD Friday. Your feedback is crucial for our submission. Let me know if you have any questions.

Thanks,
John
label: Produtivo

message:
Message-ID: <67890.JavaMail.evans@thyme>
Date: Tue, 2 Jan 2001 10:30:00 -0700 (PDT)
From: mary.jones@enron.com
To: all_employees@enron.com
Subject: Company Picnic Reminder!

Team,

Just a friendly reminder about our annual company picnic this Saturday at the park! Food and games start at noon. Hope to see you all there for some fun and relaxation.

Best regards,
Mary

message:

Subject: Re: Invoice 789 Status

Finance Team,

I need an urgent update on invoice #789. The client is asking for payment details. Can you provide the current status by end of day today?

message:
Message-ID: <44556.JavaMail.evans@thyme>
Date: Thu, 4 Jan 2001 16:45:00 -0700 (PDT)
From: hr@enron.com
To: employees@enron.com
Subject: New Policy Update: Dress Code

Dear Employees,

This email serves to inform you about a minor update to our company's dress code policy, effective immediately. Please refer to the HR portal for full details. No immediate action is required from your side.

Regards,
HR Department

message:
Message-ID: <77889.JavaMail.evans@thyme>
Date: Fri, 5 Jan 2001 09:00:00 -0700 (PDT)
From: susan.brown@enron.com
To: david.green@enron.com
Subject: Follow-up on Project Alpha Meeting

Hi David,

Following up on our Project Alpha meeting yesterday. Could you please send me the revised timeline by next Monday? I need it to finalize my part of the presentation.

Thanks,
Susan
